targets.rawSql: SELECT COUNT(id) FROM "User"

SELECT COALESCE(SUM("amount"), 0) AS "feeEligibleVolume"
  FROM "Transaction"
 WHERE "status" = 'COMPLETED'
    AND "type" IN ('TRADE_PRINCIPAL', 'REDEMPTION');
SELECT SUM("feeAmount") FROM "FeeAccrual" WHERE status = 'SETTLED'

SELECT
    COUNT(*) AS value
  FROM "User"
  WHERE "createdAt" >= NOW() - INTERVAL '24 hours';

SELECT COALESCE(SUM("amount"), 0) AS "feeEligibleVolume24h"
FROM "Transaction"
WHERE "status" = 'COMPLETED'
AND "type" IN ('TRADE_PRINCIPAL', 'REDEMPTION')
AND "timestamp" >= NOW() - INTERVAL '24 hours';

SELECT COALESCE(SUM("feeAmount"), 0) AS "feeAmount24h"
  FROM "FeeAccrual"
  WHERE "status" NOT IN ('FAILED', 'REVERSED')
    AND "accruedAt" >= NOW() - INTERVAL '24 hours';

SELECT
  u.id AS "UserId",
  u."telegramUsername" AS "TelegramUsername",
  u."telegramUserId" AS "TelegramUserId",
  u."createdAt" AS "Date"
FROM public."User" u
WHERE
  u."createdAt" >= date_trunc('day', NOW())
ORDER BY
  u."createdAt" DESC
LIMIT 1000;

SELECT
    date_trunc('day', "timestamp") AS time,
    COUNT(*) AS value
  FROM "Transaction"
  WHERE "timestamp" >= NOW() - INTERVAL '30 days'
  GROUP BY time
  ORDER BY time;

SELECT
    date_trunc('day', "timestamp") AS time,
    SUM("amount") AS value
  FROM "Transaction"
  WHERE "timestamp" >= NOW() - INTERVAL '30 days'
  GROUP BY time
  ORDER BY time;

SELECT
  u.id AS "UserId",
  u."telegramUsername" AS "TelegramUsername",
  u."telegramUserId" AS "TelegramUserId",
  u."createdAt" AS "Date"
FROM public."User" u
WHERE
  u."createdAt" >= NOW() - INTERVAL '30 days'
ORDER BY
  u."createdAt" DESC
LIMIT 1000;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT "userId") FROM "TradeExecution";
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT "userId") FROM "TradeExecution" WHERE "timestamp" >= NOW() - INTERVAL '24 hours';

SELECT
  te."userId" AS "UserId",
  u."telegramUsername" AS "TelegramUsername",
  te."marketSlug" AS "Market",
  COALESCE(te."costOrProceeds", te.shares * te.price) AS "Amount",
  te."timestamp" AS "Date"
FROM public."TradeExecution" te
LEFT JOIN public."User" u
  ON u.id = te."userId"
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(te."timestamp")
ORDER BY
  te."timestamp" DESC
LIMIT 1000;
SELECT date_trunc('day', "timestamp") AS time, "side", COUNT(*) AS value FROM "TradeExecution" WHERE "timestamp" >= NOW() - INTERVAL '30 days' GROUP BY 1,2 ORDER BY 1,2;
SELECT date_trunc('day', "timestamp") AS time, AVG("costOrProceeds") AS value FROM "TradeExecution" WHERE "timestamp" >= NOW() - INTERVAL '30 days' GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY 1;
SELECT "marketSlug", SUM("costOrProceeds") AS value, COUNT(*) AS trades FROM "TradeExecution" WHERE "timestamp" >= NOW() - INTERVAL '7 days' GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY value DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT date_trunc('day', "accruedAt") AS time, SUM("feeAmount") AS value FROM "FeeAccrual" GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY 1;
SELECT date_trunc('day', "settledAt") AS time, SUM("feeAmount") AS value FROM "FeeAccrual" WHERE "status"='SETTLED' GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY 1;
SELECT COALESCE(SUM("feeAmount"),0) FROM "FeeAccrual" WHERE "status"='ACCRUED';

SELECT
  fa."accruedAt",
  w."publicAddress",
  fa."feeAmount",
  fa."volumeUsdc",
  u.id AS "userId",
  u."telegramUsername"
FROM public."FeeAccrual" AS fa
JOIN public."Wallet"     AS w ON w.id     = fa."walletId"
JOIN public."User"       AS u ON u.id     = w."userId"
WHERE fa.status = 'ACCRUED';

SELECT CASE WHEN NOW()-"accruedAt" < INTERVAL '1 day' THEN '<1d' WHEN NOW()-"accruedAt" < INTERVAL '3 days' THEN '1-3d' WHEN NOW()-"accruedAt" < INTERVAL '7 days' THEN '3-7d' ELSE '>7d' END AS bucket, SUM("feeAmount") AS amount, COUNT(*) AS items FROM "FeeAccrual" WHERE "status"='ACCRUED' GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY 1;
SELECT COALESCE(SUM("amount"),0) FROM "Transaction" WHERE "type"='WITHDRAWAL' AND "status"='COMPLETED' AND "timestamp" >= NOW() - INTERVAL '24 hours';

SELECT COALESCE(100.0*SUM(CASE WHEN "status"='COMPLETED' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)/NULLIF(SUM(CASE WHEN "status" IN ('COMPLETED','FAILED') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0),0) AS value FROM "Transaction" WHERE "type"='WITHDRAWAL' AND "timestamp" >= NOW() - INTERVAL '7 days';

SELECT EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM percentile_disc(0.5) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY ("updatedAt"-"timestamp"))) AS value FROM "Transaction" WHERE "type"='WITHDRAWAL' AND "status"='COMPLETED' AND "timestamp" >= NOW() - INTERVAL '7 days';

SELECT EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM percentile_disc(0.95) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY ("updatedAt"-"timestamp"))) AS value FROM "Transaction" WHERE "type"='WITHDRAWAL' AND "status"='COMPLETED' AND "timestamp" >= NOW() - INTERVAL '7 days';
SELECT date_trunc('day', "timestamp") AS time, COUNT(*) AS value FROM "Transaction" WHERE "type"='WITHDRAWAL' AND "timestamp" >= NOW() - INTERVAL '30 days' GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY 1;

SELECT date_trunc('day', "timestamp") AS time, SUM("amount") AS value FROM "Transaction" WHERE "type"='WITHDRAWAL' AND "status"='COMPLETED' AND "timestamp" >= NOW() - INTERVAL '30 days' GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY 1;
SELECT date_trunc('day', "attributedAt") AS time, COUNT(*) AS value FROM "ReferralAttribution" GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY 1;
SELECT COALESCE(SUM("amount"),0) FROM "ReferralAccrual" WHERE "status"='PENDING_CLAIM' AND "matureAt" <= NOW();

SELECT d AS time, COALESCE(c,0) AS created, COALESCE(comp,0) AS completed FROM (SELECT generate_series(date_trunc('day', NOW()) - INTERVAL '30 days', date_trunc('day', NOW()), INTERVAL '1 day') AS d) days LEFT JOIN (SELECT date_trunc('day', "createdAt") AS t, COUNT(*) AS c FROM "ReferralClaim" GROUP BY 1) created ON created.t = days.d LEFT JOIN (SELECT date_trunc('day', "completedAt") AS t, COUNT(*) AS comp FROM "ReferralClaim" WHERE "completedAt" IS NOT NULL GROUP BY 1) completed ON completed.t = days.d ORDER BY time;

SELECT
  ra."attributedAt" AS "Attributed At",
  COALESCE(ref."telegramUsername", ref."telegramUserId") AS "Referrer (Telegram)",
  COALESCE(referee."telegramUsername", referee."telegramUserId") AS "Referee (Telegram)",
  ra.source AS "Source"
FROM public."ReferralAttribution" ra
LEFT JOIN public."User" ref
  ON ref.id = ra."referrerUserId"
LEFT JOIN public."User" referee
  ON referee.id = ra."refereeUserId"
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(ra."attributedAt")
ORDER BY
  ra."attributedAt" DESC
LIMIT 1000;

WITH level1 AS (
  SELECT
    ra."referrerUserId" AS user_id,
    COUNT(*) AS level1
  FROM public."ReferralAttribution" ra
  GROUP BY
    ra."referrerUserId"
),
level2 AS (
  SELECT
    parent."referrerUserId" AS user_id,
    COUNT(*) AS level2
  FROM public."ReferralAttribution" parent
  JOIN public."ReferralAttribution" child
    ON child."referrerUserId" = parent."refereeUserId"
  GROUP BY
    parent."referrerUserId"
),
level3 AS (
  SELECT
    grandparent."referrerUserId" AS user_id,
    COUNT(*) AS level3
  FROM public."ReferralAttribution" grandparent
  JOIN public."ReferralAttribution" parent
    ON parent."referrerUserId" = grandparent."refereeUserId"
  JOIN public."ReferralAttribution" child
    ON child."referrerUserId" = parent."refereeUserId"
  GROUP BY
    grandparent."referrerUserId"
)
SELECT
  COALESCE(u."telegramUsername", u."telegramUserId") AS "User",
  COALESCE(l1.level1, 0) AS "Level 1",
  COALESCE(l2.level2, 0) AS "Level 2",
  COALESCE(l3.level3, 0) AS "Level 3",
  COALESCE(l1.level1, 0) + COALESCE(l2.level2, 0) + COALESCE(l3.level3, 0) AS "Total"
FROM public."User" u
LEFT JOIN level1 l1 ON l1.user_id = u.id
LEFT JOIN level2 l2 ON l2.user_id = u.id
LEFT JOIN level3 l3 ON l3.user_id = u.id
WHERE
  COALESCE(l1.level1, 0) + COALESCE(l2.level2, 0) + COALESCE(l3.level3, 0) > 0
ORDER BY
  "Total" DESC,
  "Level 1" DESC,
  "Level 2" DESC,
  "Level 3" DESC
LIMIT 100;
SELECT "lastProcessedBlock" AS value FROM "IndexerState" LIMIT 1;
SELECT ("lastFinalizedBlock"-"lastProcessedBlock") AS value FROM "IndexerState" LIMIT 1;
